titleStmt.title: Several living testimonies given forth by divers friends to the faithful labours and travels of that faithful and constant servant of the Lord, Robert Lodge ... ; also, two general epistles, written by himself long since to the believers in Christ, and are now printed for their edification and refreshment.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained, with print show-through, tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library
